name: Tunnel: Turbo Rush Ballz Game
description:
Do you like high speed, neon and tunnels? This game is for you!

- Choose your track! Large number of racing tracks for everyone!
- NEW - Triangular tunnel
- Incredible speed
- Super effects and 3D graphics!
- Beat your highscore. It won't be easy
- Reaction training game
- Play with your friends and become the best!

Our tunnel is constantly changing. This game is never predictable!

Try to survive inside a tunnel, evade the deadly dangers!
Improve your reaction and become fastest racer!

We are constantly improving our games. Write your comments and wishes! Have a good game.
